      • addCustomer

        public static boolean addCustomer(java.lang.String firstName,
                                  java.lang.String surname,
                                  java.lang.String birthDayNumber,
                                  java.lang.String email)
        Creates a customerobject and sets all the parameters needed to persist it to the database. It Hardcodes the postalcode, phonenumber, score and address-field, because it is not as important and can be changed at a later point by the user.
        Parameters:
        firstName - is set as the firstname of the customer-object
        surname - is set as the surname for the customer-object
        birthDayNumber - is set as the birthdaynumber to the customer-object
        email - is set as the email-parameter to the customer-object
        Returns:
        boolean

      • updateFirstname

        public static boolean updateFirstname(int customerId,
                                      java.lang.String firstname)
        Used to update the first name of a customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerId - is used to get the user in the database.
        firstname - is used to set the new firstname of the user.
        Returns:
        boolean if the databasetransaction is succesfull.

        public static boolean updateSurname(int customerId,
